title: Add Developer Story section to Credits page

requirements.summary: Add a clearly labeled Developer Story section to the existing Credits page with the required Henry English and Uber-style format messaging while preserving existing credits text.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Credits page, a new section titled "Developer Story" is visible to all users.
The Developer Story text explicitly includes: "Henry English" and describes him as "the founder and technical manager".
The Developer Story text explicitly communicates that he "believes in an Uber-style format" (wording may be lightly edited for grammar, but meaning must be preserved).
Existing Credits requirements remain intact (the page still names "Henry English" and includes the phrase "A Sierra Leone Living Legend").

file_operations.description: Within the existing Credits page layout, add a new, clearly labeled "Developer Story" section containing user-facing English text stating that Henry English is the founder and technical manager of the app and that he believes in an Uber-style format, while preserving existing visible credits content (including "Henry English" and "A Sierra Leone Living Legend"). Use existing shadcn-ui Card primitives already used on the page for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
